xtc.lang.blink
Class BoundedLogQueue

java.lang.Object
  xtc.lang.blink.BoundedLogQueue

public class BoundedLogQueue
extends Object

A bounded byte sequence log. This is to support for storing and showing the most recent K-bytes messages.

          Get the last messages.
